items.sentence: Tom will have to do that even if he doesn\'t want to.
I\'ve already done everything you\'ve asked me to do.
I\'ve already told Tom that I don\'t plan to do that.
Don\'t treat me the same way you would treat a child.
Tom is wearing a different hat than he was yesterday.
Tom left some books for you on that table over there.
Tom probably thought I could help you this afternoon.
Tom lives in one of the best neighborhoods in Boston.
Tom may have missed the bus he was planning to catch.
Tom never seemed to be interested in learning French.
